item.title: Don Zimmerman, Oscar-Nommed Film Editor of ‘Coming Home,’ Dies at 81
item.description: Film editor Don Zimmerman, who was Oscar-nommed for “Coming Home” and known for his work on the “Rocky” franchise and ”Night at the Museum,” died on July 24 in Studio City. He was 81. The
